title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: This Is the End of China’s Once Mightiest Property Firm

items.title: Russia’s Top Diplomat Says There Is No Plan for Putin-Zelensky Meeting
items.description: The statement by Foreign Minister Sergey V. Lavrov deals a blow to President Trump’s efforts to mediate an end to the war in Ukraine.

items.title: SpaceX Scrubs Critical 10th Test Launch of Starship Rocket
items.description: Elon Musk’s company will reschedule the next trip of its Starship prototype, which faced setbacks in its last three flight attempts.

items.title: Millions in West facing dangerous heatwave amid multiple wildfires
items.description: Parts of California, Oregon and Washington state will experience extreme heat at least through Tuesday, forecasters said.

items.title: After Trump’s Threat to Send National Guard to Chicago, Democrats Push Back
items.description: President Trump said he was considering sending troops to Chicago, New York and Baltimore. State and local leaders say they have crime under control.
